plugin.name: winshadows
plugin._long: Server Side Shadows for windows on Wayfire

option.name: enabled_views
option._short: Decoration enabled for specified window types
option._long: Enables window shadows for windows matching the specified criteria.

option.name: include_undecorated_views
option._short: Include windows that have their own decoration
option._long: Enables window shadows on windows that do not request server side decoration.

option.name: shadow_radius
option._long: Sets the shadow radius in pixels.

option.name: clip_shadow_inside
option._long: Does not render the shadow within the rectangular bounds of a window, may look bad on rounded corners.

option.name: vertical_offset
option._long: Number of pixels to shift the shadow by in vertical direction.

option.name: horizontal_offset
option._long: Number of pixels to shift the shadow by in horizontal direction.

option.name: glow_intensity
option._long: Intensity of light emitted by the edges of the window (multiplies alpha of glow color). 0 to disable glow.

option.name: glow_color
option._long: Color of the glow of the focused window. Combine with a bright focus color for the window border decoration.

option.name: glow_radius_limit
option._long: Size of area around window where glow is rendered, 0 to disable glow. Set this as small as possible, but without visibly clipping the glow effect into a rectangle. Depends on intensity, elevation and threshold (could be computed automatically).

option.name: glow_threshold
option._long: Hide light below this threshold to avoid light spreading out too far. 0 is most realistic light spread, but increase slightly if the is lit area is too large.

option.name: glow_spread
option._long: Corresponds to elevation of the window relative to the background. Higher elevation means that the light reaches a larger area more evenly but less intense.

option.name: glow_emissivity
option._long: Controls the blending of the focus glow, 0 is normal blending, 1 is additive. Set to 0 for shadows and between 0 and 1 for glow effects.
